00066 #ifndef INCLUDE_GLOBALVARIABLES_H
00067 #define INCLUDE_GLOBALVARIABLES_H
00068 
00069 #include <inet/datatypes.h>
00070 #include <inet/ethernet.h>
00071 #include <inet/ip.h>
00072 #include <inet/tcp_ip.h>
00073 
00074 extern UINT8    NE2000NextPktPtr;                       /* Start address of next packet */
00075 extern UINT8    NE2000CurrPktPtr;                       /* Start address of current packet */
00076 
00077 extern UINT32   base_timer;                                     /* System 1 msec timer  */
00078 
00079 /* Buffers                                      */
00080 extern UINT8    net_buf[];      
00082 /* May the send & receive frames use the same structure?        */
00083 
00084 extern struct ethernet_frame received_frame;    
00085 extern struct ethernet_frame send_frame;                
00086 extern struct netif localmachine;                               
00087 extern struct ip_frame received_ip_packet;              
00088 extern struct ip_frame send_ip_packet;                  
00089 extern struct udp_frame received_udp_packet;    
00090 extern struct tcp_frame received_tcp_packet;
